MajorArcana.name: The Fool
MajorArcana.effect: The player is transported to an unknown location, gaining a random magical item but losing one current possession.

MajorArcana.name: The Magician
MajorArcana.effect: The player gains the ability to cast one spell from any class list as if they were a 20th-level caster for the next 24 hours.

MajorArcana.name: The High Priestess
MajorArcana.effect: The player receives cryptic guidance in their dreams, revealing a future event or danger.
